normalized: this is a modified version of the taimanin yukikaze 2 story, which shows the events in chronological order.
it is not recommended for your first playthrough.
a small number of lines have been added, omitted or modified in this version.
there are two versions of the mod, which each handle scenes with multiple perspectives differently.
the first displays the scenes separately, with tatsurou's perspective appearing first.
the second attempts to restructure the scenes so that both perspectives are shown simultaneously.
select which version you wish to use.
